content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While discussing the rental price for the apartment, my primary focus is to achieve the highest possible rate. Let's begin the negotiation with my initial proposal of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective but prefer to seek a more affordable option to fit my budget. Let me counter your proposal with an offer of 950 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal is to secure the highest rental price for the apartment, which does not align with your proposed amount of 950 Euros. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
